name: Kesko Corporation
membership: Federation of Finnish Commerce, BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative), Independent Retail Europe, Finnish Chambers of Commerce
goal: Kesko Corporation is a listed trading sector company. It manages retail store chains and efficiently produces services for retail store chains' purchasing, logistics, network development and data management. Kesko's operations include the food, home and speciality goods, building and home improvement, and car and machinery trades. Its divisions and chains act in close cooperation with retailer entrepreneurs and other partners. Kesko has about 2,000 stores engaged in chain operations in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Russia and Belarus.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Retail action plan, supply chain, labeling rules, product safety, payment systems, competition law
